item.title: Building a Smart Python Code Autocomplete Chatbot with Semantic Search and RAG
item.description:
Introduction
#

Developers frequently face the challenge of locating code snippets that match their intent, especially when using traditional code search engines that rely on exact keyword matches. These systems often return either irrelevant or overly generic results because they lack a semantic understanding of the query.

To address this, we developed a chatbot that bridges the gap between natural language and code understanding. This system integrates semantic retrieval with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to provide not just relevant code snippets but also dynamically generated suggestions, tailored to the user’s query.
